name: Date Fight
description:
Created for GDK Valenjam 2018.

Throw and catch gifts to the beat of the music, in 4-4 time.  Batter your partner with enough gifts to propose, propose successfully to win.

Quan Nghitran - Programming, game/sound design
Sam DelRosario - Art
Wyatt Walker - Music

Version 0.3 - February 21st
  • Added UI elements so you know how to play.
  • Character abilities added!
  • Bobbing animations added to characters, should make game easier.
  • Snare drum removed
  • Slight balance changes

todo: more characters, fix bug causing turns to sometimes be one beat short, fine tune balance
